about_the_game:
Adventure Field™ 5 Omega Charm includes :


  • The Omega Charm in-game item...

The Omega Charm is an item that you carry with a passive effect that boost the spawn rate of rare coloured omega monster by 500%...

This DLC is included in the Deluxe Edition Bundle too...

*If you have any problem installing this DLC uninstall the game and reinstall it at the same time as the DLC, it should fix it.*
detailed_description:
Adventure Field™ 5 Omega Charm includes :


  • The Omega Charm in-game item...

The Omega Charm is an item that you carry with a passive effect that boost the spawn rate of rare coloured omega monster by 500%...

This DLC is included in the Deluxe Edition Bundle too...

*If you have any problem installing this DLC uninstall the game and reinstall it at the same time as the DLC, it should fix it.*
legal_notice: This game is the propriety of Wathitdew Record™. All assets used in this game are all handmade, purchased, free or are all ok to be used as stated by their creator from where they been downloaded. All due credits are at the end of the game. Have a great time playing our game!
name: Adventure Field™ 5 Omega Charm
